snippet.title: Release Date Announced! 『All in Abyss: Judge the Fake』A Poker Battle Mystery Adventure RPG
snippet.description:
♠♣Releasing on Steam, Nintendo Switch, and PlayStation 5 on April 10, 2025!!♦♥

Wishlist the game!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2514640/

As Asuha, a self-proclaimed “genius gambler beauty,” become the champion of a trickery-filled poker game based on Texas Hold ‘em!

■ What is WSS playground
An indie game label with the motto of "Maximizing the potential of individual developers" backed by Why so serious, Inc.

Notable games: 「NEEDY GIRL OVERDOSE」「Record of Lodoss War-Deedlit in Wonder Labyrinth」 
Official Website: https://whysoserious.jp/en/ 
Official X: https://x.com/infowss
Official Youtube Channel:    / @wssplayground   

■ About ACQUIRE Corp.
ACQUIRE Corp. is a game development company known for creating the Tenchu series and the What Did I Do to Deserve This, My Lord? series, as well as developing the Octopath Traveler series.


Official Website: https://www.acquire.co.jp/
Official X : https://x.com/acquire_pr
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/developer/ACQUIRE
